definition[0]: a number of people, things, or organizations that do something together or have the same interests, qualities, or features
example[0]: a loose grouping  (=informal and not well organized) of anti-capitalist protesters
example[1]: During this period the family unit becomes the natural social grouping.
example[2]: a grouping of eight opposition parties
definition[1]: the act of putting people or things into groups
example[3]: the grouping of students by ability
